data.message:
Hey slim don’t worry I refilled that coffee pot you thought was way to hot. I’m in this thread to mark my spot. The haters will talk shit but stay out of reach because they might get shot. Most of your music I like a lot however talking shit on trump I think your mind is caught In between being an inspiration and a democratic poo poo train kid. I don’t care where your minds hid. Wanna be a puppet? Like a hand up your ass? The dems pushin that shit in and it’s your turn slim. Not slim anus anymore got cornholed and now can’t breath. Just write your rhymes and do your thing we will be waiting on that album like the microwave ding. #MAGA 🇺🇸 
This was wrote on the spot and posted. Not proofread or edited. All you little turds talking shit can eat a dick.

replies.message: Where were you when he bashed on Bill Clinton? Or when he bashed on Bush? Or any fucking sort of thing? Try to make Eminem look like a puppet for speaking his opinion, ends up making you look like a puppet yourself
Don't give up your day job.
This copy and pasted "rap" is garbage. Bye.
Fuck Trump!
Fuck your feelings bitches

Em drew his line..  Either you are on his side and not.. So fuck off and unlike his fb..  You're not welcome here..  You ain't gonna affect his legacy coz this is a holla from his fan all the way from Asia..  And there is billions of us compared to a handful of you..  Fuck off you whiny pussy-	ass snowflake nazi lovers
#cringe
Stop wasting Oxygen
Man this shit is garbage, lemme read you this tome, I'm paste over your ass like Carthage, you could call me Rome.
I like how the first part was rhyming nonsense that could flow and the second part you tried to relate to a diss track but it lost cadence. 2/10 for effort.
God this was fucking pitiful. You're not shit boyo 😂
This little ni@@a thinks he is the shit. Sorry I’ve pinched off turds bigger than you boy.
Nice wouk! May I offer a suggestion..? Go apply for a job at mcdonalds and you hold on to that shit
It’s write not right. Trump supporters are alway illiterates.
Apparently not, dumbfuck yank. You are the laughing stock of the world so sit the fuck down.
Screw politics! 😐
Yea...we can tell
Non Americans, commenting about American politics, funny how your guys opinion doesn't matter, not even the slightest bit.
Do yourself a favour...stay off the internet.

sorry but u forgot to put shady on that slim bitch and i must say i like the line where u said ''The haters will talk shit but stay out of reach''like u when u wrote this shit and to be clear i ain a hater  i'm just pointing out the stupidity of your verse or what ever u may call it and lol, i like the fact that u edited that and denied on the spot like we asked u or something and i too wrote this on the spot and posted not edit
Aaaand not a single fuvk wasgiven. Go fun biebee boy
Dude your poem even says it's edited...u straight lying

You Hicks sound so stupid and useless lol I'm gonna rap my opinions at a rapper about my feelings cus he hurt them lol it's hilarity you're just stupid though you should see the guy in the Chevy rebel and a cowboy hat or the meth head looking girl who can't even read. Lol you guys certainly are a group of useless idiots lol
